main event: On July 3, 1956, in Shafter, California, an object was observed floating above and disappearing. It was suspected to be a possible balloon for ypo.
interesting points: The report indicates that there was no photograph present in the image provided.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
The object was drifting slightly to the left and right during the observation.
The report was addressed to various military and intelligence authorities, suggesting a significant level of attention to the sighting.
There was urgency and strict confidence associated with the follow-up requests for information regarding flight plans and pilot activities.
